original_text: So tell the Israelite people now what they must do. Every man and every woman must ask the Egyptians that live near them for gold things and silver things.’
korean_text: 백성에게 말하여 사람들에게 각기 이웃들에게 은금 패물을 구하게 하라 하시더니

sentences.original_text: So tell the Israelite people now
Every man and every woman must ask
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 남자와 모든 여자는 요청해야 한다

sentences.original_text: the Egyptians that live near them
for gold things and silver things
